verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Misedra ady sarotra ve
ny fiainanao,
Noho ireo olana marobe
izay miseho?
Toa mila hampamoy fo,
mampisento,
Inty misy vahaolana
lazaiko anao:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ao ilay Jesosy, vahaolana
ho ahy sy ho anao,
Izy ilay fitiavana sy
fiadanana.
Raiso Izy anio, ô! ekeo ho
Mpamonjy anao,
Dia ho azonao antoka tokoa ny hoavinao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Raha toa fahoriana indray
no mianjady,
Aretina sy ahiahy mandratra fo,
‘Reo zava-tsarotra manjo iainanao,
Inty misy vahaolana
lazaiko anao:
Ao ilay Jesosy, sns.
